sentences.en: Boys and girls will enjoy messing about with any kind of machine.
sentences.cn: 男孩和女孩会喜欢摆弄各种机械装置。

sentences.en: Could you get me a coffee from the drinks machine ?
sentences.cn: 给我从自动饮料机里买一罐咖啡好吗？

sentences.en: Did you put my dirty shirts in the machine (= washing machine ) ?
sentences.cn: 你把我的脏衬衫放进洗衣机里了吗？

sentences.en: For two weeks, the cash machine was unable to dispense money.
sentences.cn: 该自动取款机已有两个星期不能提供现金。

sentences.en: Frances decided to conceal the machine behind a hinged panel.
sentences.cn: 弗朗西斯决定把机器藏在带铰链的嵌板的后面。

sentences.en: He frugally saved various bits of the machine in carefully marked boxes.
sentences.cn: 他厉行节约地把这台机器的各种零件放进仔细标记的盒子里收好。

sentences.en: I left a message for you on your machine (= telephone answering machine ) .
sentences.cn: 我在你的电话答录机里留了言。

sentences.en: I put the coin in the machine and pulled the lever.
sentences.cn: 我把硬币投入机器，拉动控制杆。

sentences.en: Men carrying sub-machine guns seized the five soldiers and drove them away.
sentences.cn: 持冲锋枪的几名男子俘虏了5名士兵并开车将他们带走。

sentences.en: She was drawing out cash from a cash machine.
sentences.cn: 她正从自动提款机中取钱。

sentences.en: Strips of wood are bonded together and moulded by machine.
sentences.cn: 木板条被黏合在一起并用机器压模成型。

sentences.en: The fax machine is broken.
sentences.cn: 传真机坏了。

sentences.en: The haulage company was a carrier of machine parts to Turkey.
sentences.cn: 该公路货运公司负责将机械零件运往土耳其。

sentences.en: The machine automatically downloads the required information to his or her fax.
sentences.cn: 机器能自动将需要的信息下载到传真机上。

sentences.en: The machine wouldn’t let me have any money (= cash machine ) .
sentences.cn: 自动取款机不让我取钱。

sentences.en: The new machine will go on line in June 2006.
sentences.cn: 新机器将于2006年6月投入使用。

sentences.en: The repairs to the Hafner machine were near to completion.
sentences.cn: 对哈夫纳机器的修理即将结束。

sentences.en: The three of us stood around the machine nodding wisely.
sentences.cn: 我们三人站在机器周围，若有所悟地点着头。

sentences.en: There was a smell of damp wood and machine oil.
sentences.cn: 有潮湿的木料和机油的气味。

sentences.en: You can leave a message on our answering machine.
sentences.cn: 您可以在我们的答录机上留言。

words.tran_cn: 机械；机器；机构；机械装置
机械工；机械师；机械安装修理工

phrases.tran_cn: [建]切削机，切割机；裁切机，裁剪机；截煤机；下料压力机
机器学习（能力）；机器改进（能力）
包装机，包装机械；打包机；封装机

trans.tran_cn: 机器，机械，机械般的人，核心
trans.tran_en: a piece of equipment with moving parts that uses power such as electricity to do a particular job
to make or shape something using a machine

trans.tran_cn: 用机器制造，用机器加工
trans.tran_en: to make or shape something using a machine
